name: Lost Art
description: A gentle swing in the chaotic abyss will stir up a tempest that affects everyone's fate.

weaponEffects.title: Volt Resonance
weaponEffects.description: Increase volt ATK by **15%** and volt resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more volt weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Volt Resonance or Volt Reaction effects, with Volt Resonance taking precedence.

normals.name: Wingspan
normals.description:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch **5** consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **98.9%** of ATK plus **593** and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **72.9%** of ATK plus **437** and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **138.1%** of ATK plus **829** and suspend the target.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **316.5%** of ATK plus **1899** and knock the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **199.1%** of ATK plus **1194** and knock the target down.

normals.name: Suppress
normals.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch **5** attacks in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **113.7%** of ATK plus **682**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **89.6%** of ATK plus **538**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **175.1%** of ATK plus **1051**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **343.3%** of ATK plus **2060**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **170.6%** of ATK plus **1024**.

normals.name: Advance
normals.description: While attacking on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Advance, dealing damage equal to **211.7%** of ATK plus **1270**.

normals.name: Descent
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Descent.
Dive through the air, consuming endurance and dealing damage equal to **241.9%** of ATK plus **1451** to nearby targets upon reaching the ground.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

dodge.name: Pillage
dodge.description:
Tap normal attack during the perfect dodge window (tap an arrow button before dodging forward) to trigger Pillage, dealing damage equal to **55.9%** of ATK plus **335** to nearby targets and suspending them.
Using Pillage can trigger **Feedback**.

dodge.name: Swarm
dodge.description:
Use normal attack right after dodging to trigger Swarm, summoning two Abyssant illusions which deal damage equal to **88.2%** of ATK plus **529** to targets ahead.
Using Swarm can trigger **Feedback**.

dodge.name: Weave
dodge.description: When on the ground, holding any dodge can trigger Weave, dashing for a distance toward the sky (does not work in areas where Jetpack can't be used).

dodge.name: Seal
dodge.description:
Tap and hold normal attack right after dodging to trigger Seal, launching a hive consciousness forward which controls Grayspace Entities that it hits, turning them into allies for **60** seconds (does not work on bosses).
The control state is removed when Seal is used again on an affected target or its duration ends, dealing **45%** of all damage dealt by the Wanderer during the control period.
The hive consciousness can be resisted by non-Grayspace Entity targets, which are not affected by this control effect.

skill.name: Field
skill.description:
Dash rapidly between two points **10** times, drawing in nearby targets and dealing damage up to **371.7%** of ATK plus **2230** to nearby targets. Upon landing, deal damage equal to **198.3%** of ATK plus **1190** to nearby targets. Cooldown: **20** seconds.
Each dash absorbs **10%** of the Max HP of all Crystamax thorns (unavailable in Apex League), and deals additional damage equal to the number of Crystamax thorns times **40%** of ATK, or the number of Crystamax thorns times **1%** of the Wanderer's Max HP, whichever is greater, until the Crystamax thorns are exhausted.
The **HP loss ratio** of the Crystamax thorns' Max HP counts as the **HP loss ratio** of the Wanderer's Max HP.

discharge.name: Harrah's Embrace
discharge.description:
When **weapon charge is full** or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and summon Harrah to cast **12** Tempest Rounds, each of which deals damage equal to **68.8%** of ATK plus **413** to nearby targets. During this, the Wanderer gains damage immunity for **1.5** seconds (unavailable in Apex League).
Increase volt damage by **7%** for **30** seconds after successfully using Harrah's Embrace. In addition, generate **3** Crystamax thorns (up to **5** can exist at one time). Crystamax thorns start with **100%** Max HP, are unable to be attacked, can only be healed by **Feedback**, and last for **150** seconds.
Gain **2** **Feedbacks** after Harrah's Embrace lands an attack (can stack up to **4** times). Lost Art consumes **1** **Feedback** every dodge attack, dealing damage to the target equal to the number of Crystamax thorns times **72%** of ATK, recovering **25%** of Max HP to all Crystamax thorns, and resetting Crystamax thorn location and duration.
After landing a hit with Harrah's Embrace, gain **1** opportunity to dodge without consuming a dodge attempt.

advancements.description: After triggering **Feedback**, every Crystamax thorn will deal damage to nearby targets equal to **66.7%** of ATK every **2** seconds for **undefined** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.
Using the weapon skill or the discharge skill of any other weapon will generate **1** Crystamax thorn.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.
Increase **Feedback's** Max HP recovery of Crystamax thorns to **undefined%**.
After successfully using Harrah's Embrace, increase volt damage by an additional **undefined%** for **undefined** seconds.
